titles.title: To provide for the duty-free entry of methanol produced aboard United States vessels on the high seas or in foreign waters.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E2945)

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Executive Comment Requested from Treasury, Commerce, ITC, USTR.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 11/18/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to provide duty-free entry of methanol produced from natural gas aboard U.S. vessels on the high seas or in foreign waters.
